bibl.title: Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology

bibl.seg: Frösén Jaakko, Documents from the Ptolemaic Period in the Helsinki University Collections.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 227-280.
